mapper.select: SELECT s.station_id AS stationId, s.station_name AS stationName, s.lat AS lat, s.lng AS lng, SUM(CASE WHEN c.status = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS availableCount, COUNT(c.charger_id) AS totalCount FROM charging_station s LEFT JOIN charger c ON s.station_id = c.station_id GROUP BY s.station_id, s.station_name, s.lat, s.lng

SELECT s.station_id AS stationId, s.station_name AS stationName, s.lat AS lat, s.lng AS lng, SUM(CASE WHEN c.status = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS availableCount, COUNT(c.charger_id) AS totalCount FROM charging_station s LEFT JOIN charger c ON s.station_id = c.station_id WHERE s.lat BETWEEN #{minLat} AND #{maxLat} AND s.lng BETWEEN #{minLng} AND #{maxLng} GROUP BY s.station_id, s.station_name, s.lat, s.lng

SELECT s.station_id AS stationId, s.station_name AS stationName, s.lat AS lat, s.lng AS lng, SUM(CASE WHEN c.status = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS availableCount, COUNT(c.charger_id) AS totalCount FROM charging_station s LEFT JOIN charger c ON s.station_id = c.station_id WHERE s.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%') AND s.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{district}, '%') GROUP BY s.station_id, s.station_name, s.lat, s.lng

SELECT s.station_id AS stationId, s.station_name AS stationName, s.lat AS lat, s.lng AS lng, SUM(CASE WHEN c.status = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS availableCount, COUNT(c.charger_id) AS totalCount FROM charging_station s LEFT JOIN charger c ON s.station_id = c.station_id WHERE s.station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR s.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') GROUP BY s.station_id, s.station_name, s.lat, s.lng
